name: Orcs Rising: Time Has Come !
description:
Early phase prototyping - Graphics are in a block out phase

Only starting to assemble core mechanics

Overview

Orcs Rising: Time has come! is a unique Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game that focuses on sieging strongholds defended by humans and elves. Players will experience a new perspective on orcs and their fight to free the world from corruption. The game boasts a strong story and unique approach to solving sieges that goes beyond the standard wall attacks found in typical RTS games.

Gameplay

The game combines elements of wargames and Commandos-like gameplay, allowing players to organize their army based on the different varieties they have acquired through older sieges. Players have various options, including starting negotiations, sending spies to discover the weaknesses of the enemy, reconnoitering the area, or launching night attacks to surprise their opponents.

Art Direction

Inspired by Warcraft and Lord of the Rings, the game's art direction brings stunning visuals that increase immersion. Cinematic scenes will help players follow the story through beautifully crafted visuals.

Development

The game is currently in early phase prototyping, and the basic RTS mechanics are under development. 

Feedback

As the game is still in development, feedback from the community is essential. Please feel free to reach out and provide any feedback, as it will be used to improve the game and provide the best possible experience for players.

Follow us

Stay updated on the latest developments by following us on social media and subscribing to our newsletter. Join the community and take part in the development process to make Orcs Rising: Time has come the best game it can be.
